title: Still no mystery skin?
body: I connected to Facebook before the specified date and everyone on my friends list has received their mystery champion, but I have still yet to get the mystery skin (I own all champions). I can't find any help and no one seems to know why. I haven't had any strikes, leaverbuster problems or banning of any sort. {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Same here and it's now the next day, Riot said at 14:59pm (2:59pm) they would be giving out Mystery Champions/Skins but it's now 2:15am the next day and still nothing has shown up.

 I have had a support ticket open for the last 11 hours with no response yet.
